text: Iaahed Oebbi, i wid iumnen segwen, u xedmen ayen ilhan, ara ten Irr, war ccekk, d igensas di tmurt, akken Irra wid i ten id izwaren; ara ad asen Isseqaad ddin nnsen i$ef i ten Iouva; ar ad asen Issegwri laman, deffir tugdi. Aabden iyI, ur iyI pcaraken acemma. Wid ijehlen, deffir waya, widak d iballa$en
